languages.text: {n}Волна озарения сметает мои мысли, погружает в сакральный транс. Пальцы сами скользят по священной колоде и тянут случайную карту. Это Мученик. Я вижу, как кровавая слеза омывает его бледный лик, сменяющийся лицом Плети.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Волна озарения сметает мои мысли, погружает в сакральный транс. Пальцы сами скользят по священной колоде и тянут случайную карту. Это Мученик. Я вижу, как кровавая слеза омывает его бледный лик... сменяясь лицом Плети.{/n}

languages.text: {n}A wave of epiphany sweeps my thoughts away, pulling me into a blessed trance. My fingers move of their own accord over the sacred deck and draw a card. It is the Martyr. I see a tear of blood wash over the pale features in the image, and they shift, becoming Whip's face.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Волна озарения сметает мои мысли, погружает в сакральный транс. Пальцы сами скользят по священной колоде и тянут случайную карту. Это Мученик. Я вижу, как кровавая слеза омывает его бледный лик, сменяющийся лицом Плети.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}A wave of epiphany sweeps my thoughts away, pulling me into a blessed trance. My fingers move of their own accord over the sacred deck and draw a card. It is the Martyr. I see a tear of blood wash over the pale features in the image, and they shift, becoming Whip's face.{/n}
{n}Yes, this is better. I can hear now...{/n} "Gho-o-od… ier-r-r… dha=a=a..."

{n}A wave of epiphany sweeps my thoughts away, pulling me into a blessed trance. My fingers move of their own accord over the sacred deck and draw a card. It is the Martyr. I see a tear of blood wash over the pale features in the image, and they shift, becoming Whip's face.{/n}
{n}Yes, this is better. I can hear now...{/n} "Go-o-od… ier-r-r… dha-a-a..."

{n}A wave of epiphany sweeps my thoughts away, pulling me into a blessed trance. My fingers move of their own accord over the sacred deck and draw a card. It is the Martyr. I see a tear of blood wash over the pale features in the image, and they shift, becoming Whip's face.{/n}

{n}A wave of epiphany sweeps my thoughts away, pulling me into a blessed trance. My fingers move of their own accord over the sacred deck and draw a card. It is the Martyr. I see a tear of blood wash over the pale features in the image, and they shift, becoming Whip's face.{/n}

{n}A wave of epiphany sweeps my thoughts away, pulling me into a blessed trance. My fingers move of their own accord over the sacred deck and draw a card. It is the Martyr. I see a tear of blood wash over the pale features in the image, and they shift, becoming Whip's face.{/n}

{n}A wave of epiphany sweeps my thoughts away, pulling me into a blessed trance. My fingers move of their own accord over the sacred deck and draw a card. It is the Martyr. I see a tear of blood wash over the pale features in the image, and they shift, becoming Whip's face.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Eine Woge der Erleuchtung fegt meine Gedanken fort und lässt mich in einer gesegneten Trance versinken. Meine Finger schweben über dem heiligen Kartenspiel und ziehen eine Karte. Es ist der Märtyrer. Ich sehe eine Träne aus Blut auf den fahlen Zügen, die sich in Peitsches Gesicht verwandeln.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A wave of epiphany sweeps my thoughts away, pulling me into a blessed trance. My fingers move of their own accord over the sacred deck and draw a card. It is the Martyr. I see a tear of blood wash over the pale features in the image, and they shift, becoming Whip's face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Eine Woge der Erleuchtung fegt meine Gedanken fort und lässt mich in einer gesegneten Trance versinken. Meine Finger schweben über dem heiligen Kartenspiel und ziehen eine Karte. Es ist der Märtyrer. Ich sehe eine Träne aus Blut auf den fahlen Zügen, die sich in Peitsches Gesicht verwandeln.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Una oleada de epifanía dispersa mis pensamientos y me pone en trance. Mis dedos se mueven solos sobre la baraja sagrada y elijo una carta. El Mártir. Veo una lágrima de sangre deslizarse sobre las pálidas facciones de la imagen, retorciéndose hasta formar el rostro de Látigo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A wave of epiphany sweeps my thoughts away, pulling me into a blessed trance. My fingers move of their own accord over the sacred deck and draw a card. It is the Martyr. I see a tear of blood wash over the pale features in the image, and they shift, becoming Whip's face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Una oleada de epifanía dispersa mis pensamientos y me pone en trance. Mis dedos se mueven solos sobre la baraja sagrada y elijo una carta. El Mártir. Veo una lágrima de sangre deslizarse sobre las pálidas facciones de la imagen, retorciéndose hasta formar el rostro de Látigo.{/n}

languages.text: {n}啓示の波が思考を一掃し、我を祝福の恍惚状態に引き込んだ。指が神聖なデッキの上で勝手に動き、カードを引いた。殉教者だ。血の涙がその絵の中の青白い顔に流れ、それがウィップの顔に変わっていくのが見える。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A wave of epiphany sweeps my thoughts away, pulling me into a blessed trance. My fingers move of their own accord over the sacred deck and draw a card. It is the Martyr. I see a tear of blood wash over the pale features in the image, and they shift, becoming Whip's face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}啓示の波が思考を一掃し、我を祝福の恍惚状態に引き込んだ。指が神聖なデッキの上で勝手に動き、カードを引いた。殉教者だ。血の涙がその絵の中の青白い顔に流れ、それがウィップの顔に変わっていくのが見える。{/n}

languages.text: {n}顿悟的浪潮冲刷着我的思绪，让我进入了至福的恍惚状态。我的手指仿佛有着自己的意志，在祂的圣牌上移动着，抽出了其中一张牌，那是正位的“殉道者”。一滴鲜血从牌上苍白的脸上流了下来，随后变换了形状，变成了“皮鞭”的面容。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A wave of epiphany sweeps my thoughts away, pulling me into a blessed trance. My fingers move of their own accord over the sacred deck and draw a card. It is the Martyr. I see a tear of blood wash over the pale features in the image, and they shift, becoming Whip's face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}顿悟的浪潮冲刷着我的思绪，让我进入了至福的恍惚状态。我的手指仿佛有着自己的意志，在祂的圣牌上移动着，抽出了其中一张牌，那是正位的“殉道者”。一滴鲜血从牌上苍白的脸上流了下来，随后变换了形状，变成了“皮鞭”的面容。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Une vague de révélations déferle dans ma tête et balaie mes pensées pour me plonger dans une transe bénie. Mes doigts parcourent d'eux-mêmes les saints arcanes avant de tirer une lame. Le Martyr. Une larme de sang recouvre les traits pâles qui composent l'image, et ils se mettent à évoluer pour reproduire le visage de Fouet.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A wave of epiphany sweeps my thoughts away, pulling me into a blessed trance. My fingers move of their own accord over the sacred deck and draw a card. It is the Martyr. I see a tear of blood wash over the pale features in the image, and they shift, becoming Whip's face.{/n}

Une larme de sang recouvre les traits pâles qui composent l'image, et ils se mettent à évoluer pour reproduire le visage de Fouet.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Bir aydınlanma dalgası, düşüncelerimi sürükleyip yok ederek beni kutsal bir transa sokuyor. Parmaklarım, kutsal destenin üzerinde kendiliğinden hareket ederek bir kart çekiyor. Şehit. Solgun yüz hatlarını kaplayan bir parça kan görüyorum. Yüz hatları değişerek Kamçı'nın yüzüne dönüşüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A wave of epiphany sweeps my thoughts away, pulling me into a blessed trance. My fingers move of their own accord over the sacred deck and draw a card. It is the Martyr. I see a tear of blood wash over the pale features in the image, and they shift, becoming Whip's face.{/n}
